mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESUME_BOARD (ID, R_BNO, R_NAME, R_GENDER, R_AGE, R_TEL, R_COMPANY, R_START, R_END, J_BNO) VALUES(#{id}, RESUME_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{r_name}, #{r_gender}, #{r_age}, #{r_tel}, #{r_company}, #{r_start}, #{r_end}, #{j_bno})
mapper.select: SELECT J_BNO, R_BNO, R_NAME, R_GENDER, R_TEL, R_AGE, R_COMPANY, R_START, R_END, R_DATE FROM(SELECT J_BNO, R_BNO, R_NAME, R_GENDER, R_TEL, R_AGE, R_COMPANY, R_START, R_END, R_DATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY R_BNO ASC) AS RNUM FROM RESUME_BOARD) JOB WHERE (RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd}) AND (J_BNO = #{j_bno}) ORDER BY R_BNO ASC
SELECT COUNT(J_BNO) FROM RESUME_BOARD WHERE J_BNO = #{j_bno}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESUME_BOARD WHERE J_BNO = #{j_bno} and ID = #{id}

SELECT J_BNO, R_BNO, R_COMPANY, R_START, R_END, R_DATE, ID FROM(SELECT J_BNO, R_BNO, R_COMPANY, R_START, R_END, R_DATE, ID, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY R_BNO ASC) AS RNUM FROM RESUME_BOARD WHERE ID = #{id}) JOB WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY R_BNO ASC
SELECT COUNT(J_BNO) FROM RESUME_BOARD WHERE ID = #{id}
